text.text_translated: Is graffiti art or vandalism? People have different ideas. In many countries, people write or paint on public places. They also paint on other people's things. This is vandalism. Police stop many street artists. Some artists must pay fines. City councils complain about the high cost. They clean graffiti off buildings, buses, and trains.
